original_text: While you were doing all these things, declares the Lord, I spoke to you again and again, but you did not listen; I called you, but you did not answer.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 이제 너희가 그 모든 일을 행하였으며 내가 너희에게 말하되 새벽부터 부지런히 말하여도 듣지 아니하였고 너희를 불러도 대답하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: While you were doing all these things,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이 모든 일을 할 때에,

sentences.original_text: I spoke to you again and again,
